title: Domain 4.2: Explain basic change-management best practices.
content:
📋 Documented Business Processes

  • Rollback Plan: 🔙 Plan to reverse changes if something fails.
  • Sandbox Testing: 🧪 Test updates in a safe, isolated environment first.
  • Responsible Staff Member: 👤 Assign a clear point of ownership for the change.

🔄 Change Management

  • Request Forms: 📝 Official document that begins the change process.
  • Purpose of the Change: 🎯 State why the change is being made (fix, feature, performance).
  • Scope of the Change: 📦 Identify what systems/users are impacted.
  • Date and Time of the Change: 📅 Schedule change for minimal disruption.
  • Affected Systems/Impact: 💻 What might temporarily go offline or be affected?
  • Risk Analysis & Risk Level: ⚠️ Evaluate how risky the change is (low/medium/high).
  • Change Board Approvals: 🧑‍⚖️ Change Advisory Board (CAB) must review and approve.
  • End-User Acceptance: 👍 Confirmation from users that the change works and meets needs.
